name: Tyke and Sons Lumber Co.
storyline: A few years after the events of "Chipper and Sons Lumber Co.", the newest member of the Beaver family, Mike, gets into the family business. Being led by his father Tyke, he must obtain items and craft objects for the inhabitants of the forest and many more magical places. Join Mike on an adventure that goes far beyond what you have seen before, with many quests, games, and some dark twists concerning his long-lost grandfather Chipper.
summary: Tyke and Sons Lumber Co. is a fanmade sequel to one of Scott Cawthon's earlier games, "Chipper and Sons Lumber Co.".
